title: DIESEL DANCE PARTY
overview:
This project through school of motion focused on merging two brand ideas: electronic dance music culture and the fashion brand Diesel. We had the assignment to create frames with a title lockup with Diesel branding, but had creative reign to take the images in any creative direction we chose.

*created through School of Motion. For educational purposes only.
deliverables:
• 4-6 Design Boards showing us the look and feel of the spot + a rough idea of the structure of the commercial.
  • The spot should feature the names of the 3 biggest acts on the bill.
  • There needs to be an end-card with festival logo, URL, dates, and location info for the show.
  • Imagery should reflect the Diesel brand voice.
descriptors:
• The show is being held at The Loft in Barcelona, Spain
  • The dates of the festival are September 14-16
  • The URL for more information is dieseldanceplanet.com
  • Provided the festival logo by the brand
  • Feature 3 bands in interesting ways

imageSet.alt: 6 Design Boards showing flow of commercial

metaDescription: Logan Rundquist's School of Motion Diesel Dance Party Project
